message: Let's split 60/40 Bob. A fair deal to start with.
Let's try 55/45. A bit more fair for me.
I need a better deal than that Bob. Time is money, especially for you with that inflation rate!
Inflation is biting, I need a bigger share. 58/42 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer or the inflation will eat your share alive!
